text: "Dancing Crazy" is a popular single sung by singer Miranda Cosgrove. The song is about being involved in parties and having a lovely time. Avril Lavigne was the co-writer of this song. The music critics didn't accept "Dancing Crazy". It was, however, moderately strong in certain music charts. It was released in December 2010. Category:2010 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Miranda Cosgrove songs
title: Dancing Crazy
